Designing an underwater vehicle that can withstand extreme pressure and temperatures, and is equipped with advanced technology for exploration and data collection.
Creating a team of highly skilled and experienced divers who are trained to navigate the depths of the ocean and conduct scientific research.
Developing a comprehensive plan for the mission, including logistics, communication, and contingency plans, to ensure the success of the mission.
Partnering with leading oceanography and marine biology organizations to gain access to the latest research and technology, and to share the findings of the mission with the scientific community.

Establishing a partnership with a major media outlet to create a documentary series that chronicles the journey and discoveries of the mission, and to inspire and educate the public about the wonders of the ocean.
